properties.areaDesc: Southeast Pinal County including Kearny/Mammoth/Oracle; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson/Green Valley/Marana/Vail; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; South Central Pinal County including Eloy/Picacho Peak State Park
properties.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 5 at 3:15AM MST until February 6 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Tucson AZ
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, temperatures ranging
from 22 to 28 degrees. For the second Hard Freeze Warning,
temperatures ranging from 24 to 30 degrees.

* WHERE...Tohono O'odham Nation, Tucson Metro Area, South
Central Pinal County and Southeast Pinal County.

* WHEN...The first Hard Freeze Warning is in effect until 9 AM MST
this morning. The second Hard Freeze Warning, from 11 PM tonight
to 9 AM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY
